scripts.bundleAndroid: npx react-native bundle --platform android  --entry-file index.js  --bundle-output ./bundles/index.android.bundle  --assets-dest ./bundles  --dev false
scripts.bundleIOS: npx react-native bundle --platform ios  --entry-file index.js  --bundle-output ./bundles/index.ios.bundle  --assets-dest ./bundles  --dev false
scripts.releaseAndroid: code-push release Android ./bundles 1.0.0 -d Staging  --description 'Initial releas'  --disabled false
scripts.releaseIOS: code-push release iOS ./bundles 1.0.0 -d Staging  --description 'Initial release'  --disabled false
scripts.codepush: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./bundles/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./bundles && code-push release testAndroid ./bundles/index.android.bundle 1.0.0 --deploymentName Staging && rm -rf ./bundles
